projects.name: HealthCare: Capstone
projects.description: The objective is to predict whether or not a patient has diabetes, based on certain diagnostic measurements included in the dataset. Build a model to accurately predict whether the patients in the dataset have diabetes or not.

projects.name: Customer Service Requests Analysis : Data Visualization
projects.description: Perform a service request data analysis of New York City 311 calls. You will focus on the data wrangling techniques to understand the pattern in the data and also visualize the major complaint types.

projects.name: Comparative Study of Countries : Tableau
projects.description: Your task is to compare various parameters such as income, life insurance share, market share, penetration, ratio of reinsurance accepted, and retention ratio of different countries using the sample insurance dataset and world development indicators dataset.
